title: Are the new Bontrager Aeolus RSL road wheels their fastest yet? Plus new Aeolus Pro 51 depth
content:
Fresh off of the thrill of the classics, the Bontrager wheel team announces a counterpart to its lightest ever Bontrager Aeolus RSL 37 wheels. The new wheel line, better yet – let’s call it an expansion pack – offers the same hub and attention to detail as the Bontrager RSL 37 wheels and is available […]

The post Are the new Bontrager Aeolus RSL road wheels their fastest yet? Plus new Aeolus Pro 51 depth appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
